required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase I Trial of LMP2 Antigen-specific TCR T-cell Therapy for Recurrent and Metastatic NPC Patients
clinical_study.official_title: LMP2 Antigen-specific High-affinity T Cell Receptor (TCR)-Transduced Autologous T-cell Therapy for Recurrent and Metastatic Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma, an Open-label, Single-center, Phase I Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: In this study, a single-arm, open-labeled clinical trial will be performed to determine the safety and efficacy of EBV TCR-T cells in the treatment of recurrent/metastatic nasopharyngeal carcinoma with positive EBV infection in the Chinese population.

detailed_description.textblock: All enrolled subjects will be infused with EBV TCR-T cells. The project which enrolls 27 patients, according to the patient's HLA subtypes will be divided into HLA-A2, HLA-A11, HLA-A24 three groups, 9 patients in each group. Using a dose climbing method, each group will be divided into three dose subgroups. In the first dose subgroup, 5×106/kg TCR-T cells will be returned, and in the second dose subgroup, 1×107/kg TCR-T cells will be returned. The third dose subgroup 5 x 107/kg TCR-T cells will be returned.

primary_outcome.measure: To Determine the Maximum Tolerated Dose of TCR T-cell Therapy
primary_outcome.description: Verify the MTD of LMP2 Antigen-specific TCR T-cell Therapy

arm_group.description: All enrolled subjects will be infused with EBV TCR-T cells. The project which enrolls 27 patients, according to the patient's HLA subtypes will be divided into HLA-A2, HLA-A11, HLA-A24 three groups, 9 patients in each group. Using a dose climbing method, each group will be divided into three dose subgroups. In the first dose subgroup, 5×106/kg TCR-T cells will be returned, and in the second dose subgroup, 1×107/kg TCR-T cells will be returned. The third dose subgroup 5 x 107/kg TCR-T cells will be returned.

intervention.description: All enrolled subjects will be infused with EBV TCR-T cells. The project which enrolls 27 patients, according to the patient's HLA subtypes will be divided into HLA-A2, HLA-A11, HLA-A24 three groups, 9 patients in each group. Using a dose climbing method, each group will be divided into three dose subgroups. In the first dose subgroup, 5×106/kg TCR-T cells will be returned, and in the second dose subgroup, 1×107/kg TCR-T cells will be returned. The third dose subgroup 5 x 107/kg TCR-T cells will be returned.
